Home > external > updateDocumentation.m

updateDocumentation

PURPOSE

updateDocumentation

SYNOPSIS

function updateDocumentation()

DESCRIPTION 

 updateDocumentation
    Updates HTML documentation files for all RAVEN functions. It should
    only be used when preparing `devel` branch for a new RAVEN release

    Usage: updateDocumentation()

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
This function is called by:

SOURCE CODE 

0001 function updateDocumentation()
0002 % updateDocumentation
0003 %    Updates HTML documentation files for all RAVEN functions. It should
0004 %    only be used when preparing `devel` branch for a new RAVEN release
0005 %
0006 %    Usage: updateDocumentation()
0007 
0008 %Get the RAVEN path
0009 [ST, I]=dbstack('-completenames');
0010 [ravenDir,~,~]=fileparts(fileparts(ST(I).file));
0011 %Make sure that RAVEN-provided m2html is used
0012 path(fullfile(ravenDir,'software','m2html'),path);
0013 %Get a non-redundant list of RAVEN subdirectories containing MATLAB
0014 %functions. Absolute paths are not compatible with M2HTML, so convert them
0015 %to the relative paths instead.
0016 ravenDirs_temp=dir(fullfile(ravenDir,'**/*.m'));
0017 ravenDirs=regexprep(unique({ravenDirs_temp.folder}),'^.+RAVEN.{1,1}','');
0018 
0019 %Get rid of MATLAB functions from external software
0020 ravenDirs(:,contains(ravenDirs(1,:),'software'))=[];
0021 
0022 %Remove existing "doc" directory from RAVEN
0023 rmdir(fullfile(ravenDir,'doc'),'s');
0024 
0025 %Save the current working directory and go to RAVEN root directory
0026 originalDir=pwd;
0027 cd(ravenDir);
0028 %Generate HTML documentation files for RAVEN MATLAB functions
0029 m2html('mFiles',ravenDirs,'htmldir','doc');
0030 %Go back to the original working directory
0031 cd(originalDir);
0032 
0033 end
